channel.title: ggplot2 on The Science of Dating
channel.description: Recent content in ggplot2 on The Science of Dating

item.title: You can't put a number to love, but researchers estimated one
item.description: Dating has drastically changed over the last decades. The modern world now provides new ways to find love, such as online matchmaking and speed dating. Although itâ€™s tough to put a number to love, have you ever wondered what are the odds of finding love? Working with data scientists from eHarmony, an online dating website, experts from University of Bath calculated that singletons have a 1 in 562 chance of finding love on any given day, considering they leave it entirely to fate.
